title: Missy Franklin and Joseph Schooling
description: Expectations can affect any achievement. Five-time Olympic champion Missy Franklin went into London 2012 without any expectations and had the time of her life. At Rio 2016, she admits her approach wasn’t correct. What are her expectations for Tokyo 2020? Plus, Singapore’s first ever Olympic gold medallist Joseph Schooling beat the world and Michael Phelps in Rio. How can he manage expectations going forward in his career?
